scripts.build: echo 'build has been depreciated in favor of pkg' && npm run pkg
scripts.removebuilt: echo 'removebuilt has been depreciated in favor of rmpkg' && npm run rmpkg
scripts.rebuild: echo 'rebuild has been depreciated in favor of repkg' && npm run repkg
scripts.link: echo 'Please use npm link instead' && npm link
scripts.postinstall: echo 'If you would like this CLI tool to be globally avalible, please run npm link.'
scripts.pkg: npm i && npm i pkg && pkg acli.js && npm remove pkg
scripts.rmpkg: rm -rf acli-linux && rm -rf acli-macos && rm -rf acli-win.exe
scripts.repkg: npm i && npm run removebuilt && npm run build
